The scariest thing about the preposterous #Dreamkatcher is, perhaps, that brilliant women like Radha Mitchell and horror legend Lin Shaye serve as its executive producers. An unscary, cheap film that actively humiliates its female protagonists. My review: https://t.co/7KDnd6fUpB

#Dreamkatcher is currently #23 of the top 100 most popular movies on @FandangoNOW and #10 on @iTunes top horror releases. You can find the iTunes, Amazon and Google Play links here: https://t.co/xjAELum1KC https://t.co/L5eJYI0y4n

Horror film #Dreamkatcher features a boy talking with an evil spirit. As he sleeps, his lips move in time with both sets of dialogues. Blocking conveys a personality split, and a mind letting go of its body. https://t.co/A5UpZS7yfh

It's #VODOfTheWeek, and the titles are: @AssistantFilm with #JuliaGarner, #Dreamkatcher with @Radha_Mitchell, @TheRhythmSec with @BlakeLively, #Wendy with @france_devin, and #TheWretched with #JohnPaulHoward. Which one are you watching? https://t.co/OhfP4F6Vu7
